name: HyperLoop (CG115, Brickbat, PandaGaming02, Phyrol, Yvridio)
description:
Ludum Dare 47

Objective:

Build up speed to escape the loop. Avoid the traps and keep an eye out for boosts! Destroy walls if you need a path.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

Space - Jump

Esc - Menu

Team Members:

Bradley Potzka - Systems

Christian Gonzalez - Systems

Connor Pillsbury - Shader Graphs

Nick Nguyen - Sound Manager

Rinaldo Del Gallo - Game Design
